nodes.text: Janu Blenn was a male student at a school on Merokia. His great-grandfather served as a stormtrooper for the Galactic Empire, and Karr Nuq Sin bought his helmet from Blenn. A family legend in his family alleged that Blenn's great-grandfather had once been the target of a mind trick by a Jedi during his service in the Stormtrooper Corps.
